language: East Sumbanese, Umbu Ratu Nggai dialect
annotation: M: panewi La: paneu Le: paneyu

language: Kadazan Dusun of Taginambur, Kota Belud, Sabah, Malaysia

annotation: 1. To say; s.t; to tell s.o. s.t.; to broadcast
2. To speak; to say; to make a sound
3. The expresssion or communication of thoughts and feelings by spoken words; speech
Mon-Khmer loan but reconstructs to Proto-Chamic
also pa (this is probably a sound change in progress)
